title: Sqaure Linotype
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Van-2_3753.jpg)

Hello,

Kindly advice the Font of this particular image.  
as the auto search on the myfont and whatfont is returning result which is not exactly the same.

As there are two different type of Fonts in the picture as I believe the other one is simply Times new roman; Kindly correct me if i am wrong.

thanking you in anticipation.

Hasnain

Font: 

 Earth - http://fontzone.net/font-details/earth-normal 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063647/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: hasnain125

comments.content:
Thaks Ryuk,

[http://fontzone.net/font-details/earth-normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063647/http:/fontzone.net/font-details/earth-normal "http://fontzone.net/font-details/earth-normal")

is the free font.

> Earth is the free font.

Good "question"... I know some sites offer it freely and I'm almost positive it was at DaFont so I guess it is free for personal use only. So, if you plan to use it commercially, I guess you'd have to buy a licence.
